access_id.description: The access id required to authenticate requests made to your portal's REST API.

access_key.description: The access key required to authenticate requests made to your portal's REST API.

auth_enabled.description: Do you want to authenticate requests? Defaults to true. Set to false to disable authentication for testing and development. It is STRONGLY encouraged to enable authentication for production purposes.

company.description: The name of your company (as it exists in the url of your LogicMonitor portal)
